title: Marvel Anim's 'Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man' Full Trailer
description: "With my help you'll achieve greatness." Marvel has revealed an official trailer for their next new animated Spidey series called Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man arriving for streaming this January on Disney+. "Every neighborhood needs a hero." Parker! This is a brand new take on a Spider-Man animated cartoon for kids created by animation writer Jeff Trammell. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man (so YFNSM for short?) follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming a hero, with a journey unlike we've seen and a style that celebrates the character's early comic book roots. It's set in an alternate timeline where Norman Osborn becomes Parker's mentor instead of Tony Stark. The voice cast includes Hudson Thames as Peter, Colman Domingo as Osborn, Eugene Byrd, Grace Song, Zeno Robinson, Hugh Dancy as Octavius, and Charlie Cox as Daredevil. They've modernized it and Spidey also has his own livestream, to connect with the app-addicted youth nowadays. It seems like a fun time - though I still prefer Morales' Spider-Verse. First trailer for Marvel Animation's series Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, from YouTube: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is an animated series that follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming a hero, with a journey unlike we've […]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "With my help you'll achieve greatness." Marvel has revealed an official trailer for their next new animated Spidey series called Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man arriving for streaming this January on Disney+. text: TRAILERS by December 29, 2024Source: YouTube "With my help you'll achieve greatness." Marvel has revealed an official trailer for their next new animated Spidey series called Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man arriving for streaming this January on Disney+. "Every neighborhood needs a hero." Parker! This is a brand new take on a Spider-Man animated cartoon for kids created by animation writer Jeff Trammell. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man (so YFNSM for short?) follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming a hero, with a journey unlike we've seen and a style that celebrates the character's early comic book roots. It's set in an alternate timeline where Norman Osborn becomes Parker's mentor instead of Tony Stark. The voice cast includes Hudson Thames as Peter, Colman Domingo as Osborn, Eugene Byrd, Grace Song, Zeno Robinson, Hugh Dancy as Octavius, and Charlie Cox as Daredevil. They've modernized it and Spidey also has his own livestream, to connect with the app-addicted youth nowadays. It seems like a fun time - though I still prefer Morales' Spider-Verse. First trailer for Marvel Animation's series Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, from YouTube: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is an animated series that follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming a hero, with a journey unlike we've ever seen and a style that celebrates the character’s early comic book roots. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is a new animated series created by writer Jeff Trammell, a writer on the "Craig of the Creek" series & many other animated projects before this. It's also written by Jeff Trammell; based on the Marvel Comics character created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko. Mel Zwyer is the supervising director. Made by Marvel Studios Animation. Featuring music by Leo Birenberg & Zach Robinson. Executive produced by Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt, and Jeff Trammell. Disney will debut Marvel Animation's Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man series streaming on Disney+ starting January 29th, 2025 coming soon. How does this look so far? html:
TRAILERS

by
December 29, 2024
Source: YouTube

"With my help you'll achieve greatness." Marvel has revealed an official trailer for their next new animated Spidey series called Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man arriving for streaming this January on Disney+. "Every neighborhood needs a hero." Parker! This is a brand new take on a Spider-Man animated cartoon for kids created by animation writer Jeff Trammell. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man (so YFNSM for short?) follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming a hero, with a journey unlike we've seen and a style that celebrates the character's early comic book roots. It's set in an alternate timeline where Norman Osborn becomes Parker's mentor instead of Tony Stark. The voice cast includes Hudson Thames as Peter, Colman Domingo as Osborn, Eugene Byrd, Grace Song, Zeno Robinson, Hugh Dancy as Octavius, and Charlie Cox as Daredevil. They've modernized it and Spidey also has his own livestream, to connect with the app-addicted youth nowadays. It seems like a fun time - though I still prefer Morales' Spider-Verse.

First trailer for Marvel Animation's series Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, from YouTube:

Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is an animated series that follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming a hero, with a journey unlike we've ever seen and a style that celebrates the character’s early comic book roots. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is a new animated series created by writer Jeff Trammell, a writer on the "Craig of the Creek" series & many other animated projects before this. It's also written by Jeff Trammell; based on the Marvel Comics character created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko. Mel Zwyer is the supervising director. Made by Marvel Studios Animation. Featuring music by Leo Birenberg & Zach Robinson. Executive produced by Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt, and Jeff Trammell. Disney will debut Marvel Animation's Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man series streaming on Disney+ starting January 29th, 2025 coming soon. How does this look so far?

Find more posts in: Animation, Marvel, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
